item.title: Practice with Python
item.description: This post contains sample problems using Python from homework assignments in SDS348: Computational Biology and Bioinformatics instructed by Nathaniel Woodward and taken at the University of Texas at Austin. NumPy Load the dataset faithful. Import numpy and use functions from it to compute the mean, median, and variance for each variable. Compute the correlation between the two variables using corrcoef. import csv eruptions = [] waiting = [] with open('.
